datas.title: Is there any limitation for free plan?
datas.description: Of course there are limitations to the free plan. But you don't need to worry about the free plan, because we also provide various features for users with the free plan

datas.title: What is the minimum specification to run the apps on Android or iOS?
datas.description: There are no minimum specifications to run Cofile on your device. Cofile is designed for all devices and emphasizes the user experience

datas.title: Can I downgrade the plan?
datas.description: Unfortunately you cannot downgrade plan on Cofile. However, the plan will automatically downgrade when the plan deadline expires and no plan extensions are made
